author: etan_status
content:
re IL poc, please also consider EIP-6493 https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6493#ssz-signedtransaction-container
it adds support to summarize `Transaction` to its transaction ID and from address. with MPT, there is no on-chain commitment to the tx hash
